page.title: 08THE POST OFFICE
page.content: Canna Post Office, like all the offices in Skye, the Inner Hebrides and Lochaber is a sub office of Fort William. This office restocks Canna with stamps, postal orders etc. and informs it of changes in rules and codes, which are being constantly revised to make the service to the public more efficient. The Post Office is vital for the people of Canna, enabling them to have a relatively cheap form of communication with friends and businesses all over the world. The Post Office plays an important part in keeping a ferry link between the islands. The term mail boat may be more appropiate as the ferry is subsidised by the goverment and the Post Office in order that we may receive an adequate service.
